concept.title: GPS Data Source Adaptation
concept.shortdesc: GPS Data Source Adaptation defines the Positioning Plug-in (PSY) API that allows device creators to develop Positioning Modules. It also contains a PSY test program that is used to test PSYs.

conbody.p: The Positioning Plug-ins that are developed using the Positioning Plug-in API can only be used with the Location Server eposserver.exe.
